lcIntro.p: Although the LearningDITA courses have not covered reuse (which is one of the big wins in DITA), task topics contain many potential areas for reuse.
As you create the steps in your tasks, watch out for steps that are the same from one task to another, such as:<step><cmd>Click <uicontrol>OK</uicontrol>.</cmd></step>
You might also be able to reuse boilerplate text, such as a caution or warning that accompanies many of your steps.
When you begin to consider reuse among elements in DITA, this will enable you to plan your reuse strategies.
In addition to reusing the <step> element, the <prereq>, <example>, <choices>, and <choicetable> elements in a task are all good candidates for reuse.
